name: LIST UPDATES YUM AND APT
notes: Lists *(but does not update)* packages. Works with both **yum** and **app** package managers.
content:
apt=`command -v apt-get`
yum=`command -v yum`

if [ -n "$apt" ]; then
    apt-get update
	apt-get --just-print upgrade
elif [ -n "$yum" ]; then
	yum list updates
else
    echo "Err: no path to apt-get or yum" >&2;
    exit 1;
fi
